Foundry.name: The Foundry
Foundry.description: A mobile factory, unfortunately its core lacks the proper heat shielding.

Corsair.name: Corsair
Corsair.description: Made to match the speed of the tiderunner by using its chassis, but much more risky engines.

Valkyrix.name: Valkyrix
Valkyrix.description: A heavily armored vessel, capable of sustaining a lethal hit. Loses <c=card>Basic Shot</c> in order to have 1 extra <c=card>Basic Block</c>.

Chrysalis.name: Chrysalis
Chrysalis.description: An amalgamate of no nature and no defining features. Improves its combat capabilities when destroying ships.

Echo.name: Echo
Echo.description: An ancient comms vessel, its console can easily repeat inputted commands.

Cicada1Module.name: CICADA 1.0 MODULE
Cicada1Module.description: Upon pickup: Choose a card to upgrade.

StingerModule.name: STINGER MODULE
StingerModule.description: Add a <c=card>Basic Missile</c> to your deck.

PupaModule.name: PUPA MODULE
PupaModule.description:
When playing a <c=keyword>Trash card</c>, gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> equal to double its cost.
<c=a0a0a0>Hehe, 'butt'.</c>

MonarchModule.name: MONARCH MODULE
MonarchModule.description: Add a <c=card>Basic Drone</c> to your deck.

MineSweeperModule.name: MINESWEEPER MODULE
MineSweeperModule.description: <c=midrow>Attack Drones</c> and <c=midrow>Missiles</c> do <c=damage>+1 damage to the enemy</c>.

GnatModule.name: GNAT MODULE
GnatModule.description:
Every 3rd turn: gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>.
<c=a0a0a0>I hate this thing.</c>

Cicada2Module.name: CICADA 2.0 MODULE
Cicada2Module.description: Upon pickup: Choose a card to remove.

BruiserModule.name: BRUISER MODULE
BruiserModule.description: Replace your right <c=part>wing</c> with a new one that will shoot a 0 damage shot that applies <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c> at the end of every 3rd turn.

SolarModule.name: BINARY MODULE
SolarModule.description: Gain +1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> on odd turns, <c=downside>and -1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> on even turns.

RailCannonModule.name: RAIL MODULE
RailCannonModule.description: Restore the right cannon, <c=downside>but draw 1 less card each turn.</c>

GoliathModule.name: GOLIATH MODULE
GoliathModule.description: Start every combat with a <c=midrow>space mine</c> placed in front of your <c=part>cockpit</c>.

SpikeJrModule.name: SPIKE MODULE
SpikeJrModule.description: Replace your left <c=part>wing</c> with a new one that will launch a <c=midrow>seeker</c> at the start of every 3rd turn.

Cicada3Module.name: CICADA 3.0 MODULE
Cicada3Module.description: On the second turn of combat, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>.

ReplicatorModule.name: STORM MODULE
ReplicatorModule.description: At the start of each turn, the enemy loses 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

ScarabModule.name: SCARAB MODULE
ScarabModule.description: When playing a <c=keyword>Trash card</c>, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>. Overrides <c=artifact>PUPA MODULE</c> and blocks <c=artifact>PUPA MK.2 MODULE</c> from appearing.

IonRangerModule.name: ION MODULE
IonRangerModule.description: Every <c=action>regular attack</c> from you applies 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>. Increase the damage the enemy takes from overheating by 1. Overrides <c=artifact>FIREBALL MODULE</c>.

AquaticModule.name: AQUATIC MODULE
AquaticModule.description: Add a <c=part>scaffold</c> to the middle of your ship. At the end of every turn, your <c=part>scaffolds</c> shoot for 1 damage.

DrillModule.name: DRILL MODULE
DrillModule.description: When you destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>: draw a card.

RustingModule.name: RUSTING MODULE
RustingModule.description: Gain +3 <c=hull>max hull</c>. On the third turn: the enemy gains 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

BuriedModule.name: BURIED MODULE
BuriedModule.description: On the first 2 turns of the combat: Gain 3 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>

HopperModule.name: HOPPER MODULE
HopperModule.description:
Every 3rd turn: gain 2 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>. Overrides <c=artifact>GNAT MODULE</c>.
<c=a0a0a0>I hate this thing too.</c>

FireFlyModule.name: FIREFLY MODULE
FireFlyModule.description: On the first turn of combat: Gain 2 <c=status>SERENITY</c>.

TuskenModule.name: TUSKEN MODULE
TuskenModule.description: At the start of 6th turn: Gain 2 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

GooseModule.name: HONKING MODULE
GooseModule.description: Choose a card in your deck to turn into <c=card>Annoyance A</c>. <artifact>:3</c>

InevitableModule.name: TIMESTOP MODULE
InevitableModule.description: On the first turn: gain 2 <c=status>TIME STOP</c>.

NotGoatModule.name: TRANSMISSION MODULE
NotGoatModule.description: <c=midrow>Space mines</c> and <c=midrow>missiles</c> deal 1 less damage to you. Start every combat with 2 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.

Pupa2Module.name: PUPA MK.2 Module
Pupa2Module.description: When playing a <c=keyword>Trash card</c>, draw 1 and gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>. Overrides <c=artifact>PUPA MODULE</c> and blocks <c=artifact>SCARAB MODULE</c> from appearing.

OuroborosModule.name: RECURSIVE MODULE
OuroborosModule.description: On the first turn, your rightmost card gains <c=cardtrait>recycle</c> for the rest of combat.

FoundryHeart.name: HEART OF THE FOUNDRY
FoundryHeart.description:
You can restore <c=heal>3 max hull</c> at repair yards. <c=downside>Every 3rd turn: Permanently lose 1 max hull.</c>
<c=a0a0a0>Forever beating, even if at the cost of its own body.</c>

AutoAssembly.name: AUTOMATED ASSEMBLY
AutoAssembly.description:
At the end of each combat: You may choose a <c=cardtrait>non-temporary</c> card, it will be destroyed, but you'll gain <c=hull>2 Max Hull</c>, then heal for triple its cost.
<c=a0a0a0>Adapt or die. This thing is falling apart at the seams.</c>

CorsairEngines.name: CORSAIR ENGINES
CorsairEngines.description:
At the start of each turn: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if you have less than 2. <c=downside>If you didn't move at all last turn, gain 1 <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c>.</c>
<c=a0a0a0>By all means, keep running, make this interesting.</c>

CorsairDrive.name: CORSAIR DRIVE
CorsairDrive.description:
Replaces <c=artifact>CORSAIR ENGINES</c>. Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. At the start of each turn: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if you have none. <c=downside>If you didn't move at all last turn, receive 1 hull damage.</c>
<c=a0a0a0>Be quick, or be dead.</c>

LastStand.name: LAST STAND
LastStand.description:
The first time you receive a lethal hit in each zone: Gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c> for the rest of the turn, and <c=heal>heal to full</c>.
<c=a0a0a0>Dying is not an excuse, nor an escape. There's still a job to do.</c>

DefenseProtocol.name: RETALIATION PROTOCOL
DefenseProtocol.description:
<c=keyword>Valkyrix</c> exclusive.
Your <c=part>wings</c> gain <c=parttrait>armor</c>. At the start of combat: gain 1 <c=status>PAYBACK</c>.
<c=a0a0a0>Don't be a pushover. Stand your ground.</c>

ModuleStealer.name: MODULE STEALER
ModuleStealer.description:
Defeating opponents gives you an option to improve the ship, depending on the enemy defeated. You can see all collected modules here.
<c=a0a0a0>Let me put you back together, then take you apart all over again.</c>

EchoChamber.name: ECHO CHAMBER
EchoChamber.description:
At the start of each turn: one card is drawn from the <c=keyword>discard pile</c> instead of the <c=keyword>draw pile</c> if possible.
<c=a0a0a0>You shout into the void, but the only response is your own words.</c>

CallOfTheVoid.name: CALL OF THE VOID
CallOfTheVoid.description:
Replaces <c=artifact>ECHO CHAMBER</c>. At the start of each turn: one card is drawn from the <c=keyword>discard pile</c> instead of the <c=keyword>draw pile</c> if possible. Cards drawn this way that cost 3 or more <c=energy>ENERGY</c> are <c=cardtrait>discounted</c> by 1.
<c=a0a0a0>You shout into the void. The replying voice is no longer your own.</c>

AncientRecall.name: ANCIENT RECALL
AncientRecall.description:
The first time your <c=part>COMMS</c> get shot each combat: Return a random card from the <c=keyword>exhaust pile</c>.
<c=a0a0a0>This ship isn't soundproof. I can hear you scream.</c>
